title: Sword Art Online
description: In the year 2022, a next-generation virtual reality online role-playing game called Sword Art Online takes the world by storm. However, players soon realize they cannot log out; the game's creator has trapped them until they complete all levels.

characters.name: Kirito
characters.description: A skilled player who is determined to escape from Sword Art Online.

characters.name: Asuna
characters.description: A strong, kind-hearted player who becomes Kirito's partner.
